name: @nimblebraininc/openweathermap
description: OpenWeatherMap MCP Server for weather data, forecasts, alerts, and air quality

api_key.title: OpenWeatherMap API Key
api_key.description: Your OpenWeatherMap API key from https://openweathermap.org/api

tools.name: search_location
tools.description: Resolve location query to coordinates with candidate matches

tools.name: check_weather
tools.description: Get current weather conditions for a location

tools.name: get_forecast
tools.description: Get weather forecast (hourly/daily with alerts or 5-day/3h)

tools.name: check_air_quality
tools.description: Get air quality index and pollutant levels for a location

tools.name: get_historical_weather
tools.description: Get historical weather for a past date (requires One Call API subscription)
